house_listing.house_description: *4 bedrooms +5th room for office/study! Exciting carauana ranch on quiet culdesac lot. Bright & open! Great rm w/cath ceiling wood beams & skylights. Huge eat-in kitchen w/center island, tons of cabinets, & gas cooktop. Ceramic tile floor in baths, luxury master suite w/huge walk-in closet.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Cable TV, Cathedral/Vaulted Ceilings, Ceiling Fan(s), Fenced, Foyer,Garage Door Opener, Outside Sprinkler System, Ranch Style, Skylights,Utility Room, Walk-In Closet(s)
